amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Customs Enforcement Cyber Crime Center by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Immigration and Customs Enforcement by $5,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 348 - 74 (Roll no. 215).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Stupak.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
